Articles.Content:
How much DeltaV do you roughly need from 100 km above Eve to 100x100km Kerbin Orbit? Currently my ship has only 1500m/s left.

Edited June 7, 2013 by Canopus
1500 m/s should be plentyof delta-v for returning to Kerbin, as long as you use aerobraking in Kerbin's atmosphere.
Aerobraking is a little problem. The challenge to bring Roche to Kerbin only allows aerobraking if the asteroid is shielded, and i don't know if the large tank is big enough to do that.
Depending on your launch window it looks like it'll cost between 2500 and 3000 m/s without aerobraking. You can play with the various options using my calculator here: http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp

Depending on your launch window it looks like it'll cost between 2500 and 3000 m/s without aerobraking. You can play with the various options using my calculator here: http://alexmoon.github.io/ksp
Thank you very much
